subject: Concussions
Sports Injuries
Skiing
Snowboarding
Helmets
lead_paragraph: Michael Schumacher’s injury has brought attention to an unsettling trend: Despite increased use of safety gear in skiing and snowboarding, the risks in the sports have also increased.
snippet: Michael Schumacher’s injury has brought attention to an unsettling trend: Despite increased use of safety gear in skiing and snowboarding, the risks in the sports have also increased.
